source.2a0c7aa1:
for x_long,x_lat,x_keys in zip(DATA_1_LONG_LIST,DATA_1_LAT_LIST,DATA_1_RHOA_LIST):
    
    figure = plt.figure(figsize=(16,10))

    axis_func = plt.axes(projection=ccrs.SouthPolarStereo())
    axis_func.set_global()
    axis_func.coastlines(resolution="110m",linewidth=3)
    axis_func.gridlines(linestyle='--',color='black',linewidth=1)

    axis_func.add_feature(cartopy.feature.LAND)
    axis_func.add_feature(cartopy.feature.OCEAN)

    axis_func.set_extent([-180, 180, -90, -60], ccrs.PlateCarree())

    plt.contourf(x_long, x_lat, x_keys, transform=ccrs.PlateCarree(),cmap="hot")

    color_bar_func = plt.colorbar(ax=axis_func, orientation="vertical", pad=0.05, aspect=16, shrink=0.8)
    color_bar_func.ax.tick_params(labelsize=5)

    plt.title(DATA_1_2018.variables["rhoa"].long_name)
    plt.tight_layout()
    plt.show()
